translation.en: SOLDIER [ON RECORDING]: Falcon Main, this is Bravo Team.
Falcon Main, this is Bravo Team. Do you copy?
translation.zh: 主猎鹰,这是B队.你听到吗?

translation.en: Storm incoming. Zero visibility. Request immediate support.
translation.zh: 暴风雨来了.可见度为零.请立即支援.

translation.en: Falcon Main, something's in here with us. Send immediate support.
translation.zh:
主猎鹰,有某些东西和我们一起.
请立即支援.

translation.en: Falcon Main, this is Bravo Team. Send immediate support.
translation.zh: 主猎鹰,这是B队.请立即支援.

队长. -马歇尔.
-林克在前面半公里处有所发现.

translation.en: Link found something half a klick ahead.
translation.zh:
-马歇尔.
-林克在前面半公里处有所发现.
艾克斯...跟着斯蒂勒.负责机关枪.

translation.en: With Steeler. Man the 50. AXE: Yes, boss.
translation.zh:
艾克斯...跟着斯蒂勒.负责机关枪. -是的,队长.
-好了,女士们.出发.

translation.en: She's a woman, but she still manages to make that sound like an insult.
translation.zh: 她是女人但她的语气还是像羞辱人.
队长.你看到这些里程碑吗?

translation.en: Do you have any idea what they are?
Sergeant Davis, I'm a Ranger, not an archeologist.
translation.zh:
戴维斯中士,
我是游骑兵,不是考古学家.

艾克斯! -什么?
-你在听什么?

translation.en: What are you listening to? George Jones.
translation.zh:
-什么?
-你在听什么? 乔治琼斯.

translation.en: You're a philistine, Steeler. Yes. Yes, I am.
Damn, Marshall. You got hella reflexes.
translation.zh: 马歇尔, 你的反应很快.

translation.en: Killing them. Take no prisoners, Davis.
translation.zh:
-杀光他们.
-戴维斯,不要留活口.

translation.en: Link, what'd you find? It's definitely Bravo Team.
What were Bravo Team traveling in? Up-armored Humvee and a M-ATV.
translation.zh:
-B队乘什么到达这里?
-悍马武装车和马特-V.
那是10吨装甲车.不可能就这样消失.
那是10吨装甲车.不可能就这样消失. 队长.我们有所发现.

translation.en: Where did that come from? Out of nowhere.
Bravo Team reported a storm in their last transmission.
translation.zh: B队在最后一次报告说遇到了风暴.

translation.en: Hostiles using it for cover? An ambush. Like in Helmand?
translation.zh:
-敌方使用它作掩护?
-埋伏.好像在赫尔曼德吗?

translation.en: REDCON-1. If there are hostiles hiding behind that storm,
translation.zh:
准备袭击. 如果有敌人躲在风暴后面,
情况会很危险.

如果有敌人躲在风暴后面,
情况会很危险.

translation.en: Marshall, what are you doing, bro?
In case I get my head blown off, they can still tell who I am.
translation.zh: 如果我的头被轰掉... 他们还记得我是谁.

translation.en: Link, you ever seen lightning like this before?
translation.zh: 林克!你有看过这种闪电吗?

translation.en: But I feel pretty secure here in this big steel box,
translation.zh: 但是我觉得在这个大铁盒里...
拿着我的金属枪很安全.

translation.en: Dash, on your 12! Look at those markers!
translation.zh: 戴斯!你的十二点方向!看那些里程碑!

translation.en: Where the hell are we? And what happened to the storm?
translation.zh: 我们在那里?暴风雨发生了什么事?

translation.en: Did we just get hit by lightning?
Where did all this sand come from?
ARTEMIS: This isn't right, none of it.
I don't see any structures or mountains marked on this map.
translation.zh: 我没看到地图上有任何建筑物或山脉.

translation.en: According to this, the nearest sand dune is 20 klicks away.
translation.zh: 根据这里... 最近的沙丘在20公里外.

translation.en: How's that possible? AXE: Where the hell are we?
How did we get so far from the road? I don't know.
translation.zh:
-我们怎么离开道路那么远?
-我不清楚.

translation.en: Axe, get on one of those dunes
translation.zh:
艾克斯,
爬上其中一个沙丘和设立观察点.

translation.en: and set up an observation point. Yes, boss.
translation.zh:
艾克斯,
爬上其中一个沙丘和设立观察点. 遵命.

translation.en: ARTEMIS: Steeler! DPV will run. She's had worse.
translation.zh: 斯蒂勒! 甲车还能动.它之前遇过更糟糕的情况.

-马歇尔?
-队长,全球定位系统坏了.

translation.en: Radio and sat. All I get is static.
translation.zh:
收音机和卫星电话没动静.
连指南针也坏了.

translation.en: Even the compass is screwed up. Must've been the lightning.
translation.zh:
收音机和卫星电话没动静.
连指南针也坏了. -一定是被雷击.
-你想怎么做?

translation.en: Well, what do you wanna do?
Go analog. Navigate by the sun.
Make it back to base. We hoof it if we have to.
translation.zh: 回去基地.如果必须的话,我们步行.

translation.en: Yeah, well, we keep going till we get comms.
translation.zh: 我们一直步行直到恢复通讯.

translation.en: Then AWACS will call in support. They'll send helos, maybe armor.
translation.zh:
AWACS将派出支援.
他们会派直升机或装甲车.

队长... -说.
-有些东西你必须看.

translation.en: What do we do about them? When we get comms,
translation.zh:
我们如何处理他们? 恢复通讯后,
我们会通知回收队来取尸体.

translation.en: we'll call in recovery assets to retrieve the bodies.
translation.zh:
恢复通讯后,
我们会通知回收队来取尸体.

translation.en: Never seen a flamethrower do this to a man.
translation.zh: 从未见过喷火器会造成人这样.

translation.en: Not even napalm burns that hot.
translation.zh: 甚至凝固汽油也不是那么烫.

translation.en: Glass? When sand melts, it turns to glass.
This shit is officially above my pay grade.
Looks like they made a stand.
Let off a lot of rounds. They didn't hit anything.
translation.zh: 开了很多枪. 但没有射中目标.没有尸体.
但没有射中目标.没有尸体.

translation.en: Maybe they took the bodies with them?
I've seen that before. LINK: Yeah.
translation.zh: 我以前看过这样的情形. 这就是问题.

translation.en: Well, that's just the thing. What do you see, Link?
translation.zh: 这就是问题. 林克,你看到什么东西?

translation.en: Whoever did this, they didn't leave a mark.
translation.zh: 不管是谁干的,他们没有留下痕迹.

translation.en: We need to get moving. Move out!
Dark Star to Falcon. Dark Star to Falcon, over.
Damn it. Lightning really messed up the electronics, huh?
translation.zh: 该死,电击破坏所有电子产品.

translation.en: What do you mean? This isn't right.
That lightning, it did something to us.
translation.zh: 那闪电...对我们做了一些事情.

translation.en: Captain knows what she's doing, all right?
translation.zh: 队长知道她在做什么,好吗?

translation.en: ♪ They say that in the army The pay is mighty fine ♪
♪ They say that in the army The pay is mighty fine ♪
♪ They give a hundred dollars And take back 99 ♪
MARSHALL & ARTEMIS: ♪ They give a hundred dollars And take back 99 ♪
BOTH: ♪ But they won't let me go ♪
♪ They say that in the army The shoes are mighty fine ♪
♪ You ask for size 11 They give you size nine ♪
♪ You ask for size 11 They give you a size nine ♪
♪ Oh, Lord, I wanna go But they won't let me go ♪
translation.zh: 天啊,我要走但是他们不给走

translation.en: It has to be a dinosaur, right?
translation.zh: 这一定是恐龙,对吗? 有一次在博物馆里看到恐龙.

translation.en: Saw a dinosaur in a museum one time. It wasn't that big.
translation.zh: 有一次在博物馆里看到恐龙. 但没有那么大.

translation.en: What's going on? It's just chalk.
translation.zh: 发生什么事? 只是粉.

translation.en: STEELER: What the hell is that?
Come on, get out of here! No way!

translation.zh:
-快离开这里!
-不行!一... -我的天...
-二,三.

translation.en: Give me your hand. Come on!
MARSHALL: I got it, I got it! Move, move!
What was that thing? What is that?
I told you. I told you. That light, it took us somewhere.
translation.zh: 我说过那团光会带我们去某处.

translation.en: We need to get back. We need to get back home.
Stow it, Sergeant Davis. Oh, God. We're gonna die here.
translation.zh:
-冷静 戴维斯军士.
-我的天,我们会死在这里.

translation.en: Shut that shit up right now, soldier. That's an order.
translation.zh: 你给我闭嘴,士兵,那是命令.

translation.en: You see what it did to Steeler and Axe?
translation.zh:
你看到它对斯蒂勒和艾克斯
做了什么吗?

translation.en: Dash, hey. I got three. You?
What does it matter? Did you see that?
translation.zh: 重要吗?你看到那东西吗?

translation.en: It matters because we're soldiers. And this is what we do. We fight.
translation.zh:
重要因为我们是军人
而我们的工作就是战斗

translation.en: Am I right? Rangers lead the way.
You know, I don't care what the hell that thing is.
We do what we do best. We fight and we survive.
translation.zh:
我们做我们最擅长的事.
我们战斗和活下来.

translation.en: No matter what the odds. You got it?
translation.zh: 不管有多大机会.明白吗?

translation.en: Now, I got three left. What about you?
Don't die on me, Ranger. Come on.
translation.zh:
别死,游骑兵.加油! -没心跳.
-不能接受.再尝试.

translation.en: Lack of pulse. Unacceptable. Try it again.
I'm sorry. Shit! There's more of them!
DASH: Come on! We have to go!
What is it? What is it?
Pain in my chest! I can't feel my arm.
translation.zh: 我的胸口很痛.感觉不到我的手臂.

translation.en: You just gotta work through it. Come on. Let's move. Come on.
translation.zh: 你必须撑住. 来.走吧.

translation.en: All right, it's just a little further. Let's go.
Okay, let me see. Let me see what it is. [GROANING]
God, Link! No! You gotta go!
Hey. How about that? [SPEAKS IN ALIEN LANGUAGE]
Yeah. You don't like that, huh? Not so funny now, huh?
translation.zh: 你不喜欢吗?现在没那么好笑了吗?

translation.en: Here, give it to me. Look, look.
Heh. Slow down. Okay, it's good.

translation.zh:
巧克力. -巧克力.
-是的,巧克力.

translation.en: Chocolate! I don't have any more.
No, no more, no more, no more. Look, look. Nothing.
Oh, my God. Thank you so much. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天.谢谢你. 我的天.

translation.en: Me and you go out there?
Yes. That lightning, I think that's what brought me here.
translation.zh: 是的. 我想是那闪电带我来这里.

translation.en: I need to go there. I need to get home.
translation.zh: 我必须回去那里.我必须回家.

translation.en: That thing is still out there.
No. We don't need to go back in there.
We need to go out there. Diablos.
translation.zh: 我们必须出去那里.角龙.

translation.en: To kill a monster, you need a monster.
translation.zh: 要杀一只怪物,你需要另一只怪物.

translation.en: But how are we gonna get one of those things?
translation.zh: 但是我们要如何捉到它?

translation.en: ARTEMIS: ♪ They say that in the army ♪ ♪ The coffee's mighty fine ♪
translation.zh: 他们说在军中咖啡是最棒的

translation.en: ♪ It looks like muddy water And tastes like turpentine ♪
translation.zh: 它像泥水味道像松节油

translation.en: ♪ Oh, Lord, I wanna go But they don't let me go ♪
translation.zh: 天啊,我要走但是他们不给走

translation.en: ♪ They say that in the army The men are mighty fine ♪
♪ To me They look like hunchbacks ♪ ♪ And sound like Frankenstein ♪
translation.zh: 我觉得他们像驼子,声音像科学怪人

translation.en: ♪ Oh, Lord, I wanna go But they won't let me go ♪
translation.zh: 天啊,我要走但是他们不给走

translation.en: Okay. All right, all right. That's enough. That's enough.
Really trying to get in here, huh?
Are you gonna see them? Are you gonna go home?
translation.zh: 你要去见他们吗?你要回家吗?

translation.en: What is that? You gotta tell me about that.
translation.zh: 那是什么?你必须告诉我.

translation.en: You can't just do that to somebody.
translation.zh: 你不能随便这样作弄人.

translation.en: Know what I'm gonna do next time you're dying in the desert?
translation.zh:
下次你快要死在沙漠上,
你知道我会对你做什么吗?

translation.en: Catch Cephalos. I'll eat anything at this point.
translation.zh:
-捉背甲龍.
-此刻我可以吃些任何东西.
是的. 我回家的路.我希望是.

translation.en: Whoo! Whoo! Chocolate. No, no, no.

translation.zh: 发生什么事? 雄火龙.

translation.en: You said that before. What the hell is a Rathalos?
translation.zh: 你之前说过.什么是雄火龙?

translation.en: My friend tells me I misjudged you...
translation.zh: 我的朋友说我可能误判你.

translation.en: that I might even owe you an apology.
Why did you put me in chains? What are you so afraid of?
and what it could do to mine.
translation.zh: 和它可能破坏我的世界.

translation.en: You aren't the first to cross over from your world.
translation.zh: 你不是第一个从你的世界过来的人.

translation.en: There were others. A long time ago.
translation.zh: 还有其他人,在很久以前.

translation.en: That's how you speak my language?
translation.zh: 所以你学会了说我的语言?

translation.en: Mmm, I made a study of it. What happened to me?
translation.zh: 我研究过. 我发生了什么事?我怎么来到这里?
我发生了什么事?我怎么来到这里?

translation.en: I believe that the answers we both seek lie here.
translation.zh: 我相信我们要找的答案在这里.

translation.en: At the peak of that mountain lies the Sky Tower.
It is said that the Ancients knew how to travel between both worlds.
translation.zh: 传说古人懂得穿梭两个世界.

translation.en: I believe that is the purpose of the Sky Tower.
translation.zh: 我相信那是天塔的用途.

translation.en: That is what brought you here.
What happened to this ancient civilization?
translation.zh: 这古文明发生了什么事?

translation.en: They destroyed themselves. Their technology turned on them.
translation.zh: 他们毁灭了自己.他们的科技害死他们.

translation.en: You think my world had something to do with it.
translation.zh: 你认为我的世界跟它有关?

translation.en: I suspect. But an open gateway between our two worlds
translation.zh:
我怀疑. 但是我们两个世界之间的门户
曾经是个灾难.

但是我们两个世界之间的门户
曾经是个灾难.

translation.en: I intend to make sure that doesn't happen again.
We were on our way to investigate the Sky Tower
translation.zh: 我们在调查天塔的途中

translation.en: when we strayed into the Diablos.
That's where I lost my friend here.
translation.zh: 我就是在那时候失去了我这位朋友.

translation.en: Tending to the wounded and repairing the ship was our first priority.
translation.zh: 治理伤者和修船是我们的优先工作.

translation.en: But now we resume our mission.
translation.zh: 但是现在,我们要继续我们的任务.

translation.en: The Ancients would guard their technology with the most fearsome of creatures,
translation.zh:
古人用最凶残的生物
来守护他们的科技...

translation.en: Their only weakness is just before they breathe fire.
translation.zh: 它们唯一的弱点是在喷火之前.

translation.en: You help us with the battle ahead,
perhaps we can help you get home.
translation.zh: 也许我们可以送你回家.

translation.en: You don't have cats in your world?
You been drinking from my mug again?
We leave at dawn. And don't keep me waiting.
translation.zh: 我们在早上出发.别让我等.
怎样? 你准备好了吗?

translation.en: We got a hard climb ahead of us.
We believe that the lava powers the machinery within the tower.
translation.zh: 我们相信熔岩热量推动塔内的机器.

translation.en: It's creating a gateway to your world, but it looks unstable.
translation.zh: 它制造通往你的世界的入口... 但是它看起来不稳定.

translation.en: Remember, they're weak just before they breathe fire.
translation.zh: 记住,它们在喷火前很弱.

translation.en: It's okay! It's okay. You're safe now! Get the medic!
translation.zh: 没事!你安全了! 叫医护来!
抬她进去里面! 抬起来!

translation.en: [DISTORTED] Captain, we've been searching for you.
What the hell is she wearing?
Falcon Main, this is Red Wolf.
PILOT [OVER RADIO]: We've made contact with Dark Star.
I say again, a lone survivor.
Ground forces are securing the area. Copy that, Red Wolf.
translation.zh:
-地面部队正在防守周边范围.
-收到,红狼.

translation.en: Where are the rest of your men?
[IN REGULAR VOICE] Where are the rest of Alpha Team?
Yeah, I... still don't understand you, man.
I don't have any more chocolate.
You're here. We came to help.
We can't have monsters from my world attacking yours.
translation.zh:
我们不能让我们的世界的怪物
袭击你的世界.

translation.en: There's going to be another attack.
We have to shut the Sky Tower down.
Let's try to live through this first.
